name: LiftMyMood
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lift my mood
des:
This skill is build upon a quote database, from which random quotes corresponding to the mood of the user are selected and presented to user to alleviate bad moods and spread positivity. Use this skill today and feel the difference in attitude that inspirational quotes bring.

Usage Instruction:
Invoke with: Alexa, start lift my mood
Alexa replies
Say your emotion in one sentence
Alexa replies with a quote.

Attribution:
Reddit
Brainyquote
swoogle.umbc.edu
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
